WorkItem.Description:
Version: Webversion of rwar
 
It keeps closing to select the menu "file". Not sure if this is a known issue or if I'm doing something very wrong.
 
- After two letters (by opening and typing one letter at a time) it will usually stop closing the filter menu and going to menu "file".
 
Browser: Google Chrome.
WorkItem.Summary: Item slot filter closing instantly when typing
